nodes.bodyText:
Lets rename this now that its an extended class controller
Maybe
OSLocationController?
OneSignalLocationController?
We can also leave it as is if you think its fine
I think it is fine to leave for now.
Actually I will like a full refactor for location, but out scope for now.
Why wrap OSUtils.isHuaweiDeviceType(); when we can just use it directly?
This wrapping makes the code where isHMSAvailable() is called more readable so I think this is preferred.
Why wrap OSUtils.isAndroidDeviceType(); when we can just use it directly?
This wrapping makes the code where isGooglePlayServicesAvailable() is called more readable so I think this is preferred.

We should check for location permission here before attempting to access GMSLocationController or HMSLocationController.
Otherwise NoClassDefFoundError will print in the logcat if they are don't have the location library in their app.
